title: I was skeptical of new Ahri at first
body: But now that I have played around with it a bit I've changed my mind I defiantly like this Ahri better I just wanted to know if anyone had any tips they could give me from their experience on new Ahri.

replies.body: nothing really changed everyone is playing the %%%% out of her

Step 1) Land E
Step 2) Mash face into keyboard.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xrUc1e83,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-04T00:17:46.152+0000)
>
> Step 1) Land E
> Step 2) Mash face into keyboard.

so it's the same as before.
